languages.text: The user immediately gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. For the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} their MP and AP are reduced by −2.
languages.original_text: Персонаж немедленно получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. В следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} число ОП и ОД сокращается на 2.

traits.locale_text: The user immediately gains +4 MP and +4 AP. For the next turn their MP and AP are reduced by −2.

languages.text: 使用者立刻获得4点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与4点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。但在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，使用者的移动点数与行动点数降低2点。
